titles.title: Ovarian Cancer Research and Information Amendments of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for programs regarding ovarian cancer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 7/29/1993--Introduced. Ovarian Cancer Research and Information Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1994 through 1996 for research on ovarian cancer. Specifies information to be included in information and education programs relating to ovarian cancer.
